appsgate.lig.meteo.yahoo
Class YahooMeteoImplementation

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.meteo.yahoo.YahooMeteoImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Meteo
public class YahooMeteoImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Meteo

Implementation of Yahoo forecast, allows to change unit (Celsius,Fahrenheit) but gives maximum 2 days forecast, as input its required the WOEID (http://developer.yahoo.com/geo/geoplanet/guide/concepts.html#hierarchy) which indicats the location for the forecast. This class parses the information obtained in from weather yahoo service: e.g. http://weather.yahooapis.com/forecastrss?w=12724717&u=c

Author:
jnascimento
